name: sblbisvOLD
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2))

stmt.origin: bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wb(wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| wb(wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2))
-| wb(wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

stmt.origin: bibi2i(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1), w2)

body.origin:
|- wb(wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wsb(s0, s1, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), w2)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ sblbis as of 24-Jul-2023. Introduce left biconditional inside of a substitution. Version of ~ sblbis with a disjoint variable condition, not requiring ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 18-Jan-2023.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
